Class InboxStorage

    InMemoryInboxStorage

    @SPI
public abstract class InboxStorage
extends ShardedStorage<io.spine.server.delivery.InboxMessageId,io.spine.server.delivery.InboxMessage,InboxReadRequest>
    Abstract base for the storage of Inbox messages.
